page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: Castleton has 39 council owned,the rest are privatley owned.Most are stone built.16 council houses are 1 bedroomed bungalows,14 are 3 bedroomed houses.The rest are 1 or 2 bedroomed flats and a 2 bedroomed house.7 old peoples bungalows are being built now and over the next 5 years between 14 and 19 more bungalows of this kind will be built. 77 people are on the Council's waiting list as follows: 1 bedroom 11 2 bedrooms 19 3 bedrooms 13 old peoples dwellings 34 77 8 Council houses (3 bedroomed) have been purchased from the council by tanants.
